Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: AI Agents 101 Interactive Training Platform

ðŸŽ“ Complete browser-based training platform for learning AI agents

Created by Yuval Avidani \(@hoodini\) - AI Builder, Speaker & Educator
Founder of YUV.AI \(https://yuv.ai\)

Features:
- 8 progressive labs covering AI agent fundamentals
- Interactive code cells with Monaco Editor
- Real LLM integration \(Groq, Cohere, OpenAI\)
- 100% browser-based execution
- Progress tracking with localStorage
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Built with React 18 + TypeScript + Vite
- LangChain.js for agent framework

Labs included:
1. Understanding AI Agent Components \(LLM, Tools, Memory\)
2. Simple Prompt/Response Agent
3. Custom System Prompts
4. Conversation Memory
5. Knowledge Base Integration
6. RAG with Wikipedia \(embeddings & vector search\)
7. Multi-Agent Collaboration
8. Orchestrator Agent with Routing

Tech Stack:
- React 18 + TypeScript + Vite
- Tailwind CSS
- LangChain.js
- Monaco Editor
- Zustand state management
- Lucide React icons

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix TypeScript errors and build configuration

- Fixed type imports to use `type` keyword for verbatimModuleSyntax
- Updated Lab4 to use message arrays instead of deprecated BufferMemory
- Fixed unused parameter warnings in Labs 2-8
- Added missing Database icon import in Lab6
- Reverted to stable Tailwind CSS v3 for compatibility
- Restored PostCSS configuration
- Fixed JSX div/section tag mismatch in Lab7

Build now completes successfully with production-ready bundle.
